name: Roy Tang
text: [@pastor_ey](https://twitter.com/pastor_ey/) [@wawam](https://twitter.com/wawam/) [@yusufledesma](https://twitter.com/yusufledesma/) [@momblogger](https://twitter.com/momblogger/) Thank you for the lively debate (and for keeping the discourse to a mostly reasonable level), and for entertaining my humble opinion. If you wish to advocate for allowing cellphone numbers to be blocked on the say-so of one party without recourse for dispute, more power to you. In the meantime, I don't mind accepting their policy and shall continue to report spammers, however little it may help
